avdta.sav

Class ReadSAVNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.ReadNetwork
      • avdta.demand.ReadDemandNetwork
        • avdta.sav.ReadSAVNetwork

  • public class ReadSAVNetwork
extends ReadDemandNetwork
    This contains methods to read a SAV network, fleet, and demand from file. To access, call readNetwork(avdta.project.SAVProject).

    • Method Detail

      • readNetwork

        public SAVSimulator readNetwork(SAVProject project)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a SAVSimulator from the files specified by the project. This replaces zones with SAVOrigin and SAVDest as appropriate. This also links origin and destination zones. Finally, it creates travelers and the SAV fleet.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        Returns:
        the associated simulator
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file is not found

      • createZones

        public Zone[] createZones(int id,
                          Location loc)
        Creates zones for the specified id and location. The destination zone uses -id.
        Overrides:
        createZones in class ReadNetwork
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the zone
        loc - the location
        Returns:
        returns an array containing the created zones in the order (origin, dest).

      • readTravelers

        public java.util.List<Traveler> readTravelers(SAVProject project)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        This creates a list of travelers from the demand file.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        Returns:
        a list of travelers
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file is not found

      • getFleetFileHeader

        public static java.lang.String getFleetFileHeader()
        Returns the header for the fleet file.
        Returns:
        the header for the fleet file

      • createFleet

        public void createFleet(SAVProject project,
                        int total)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This creates a fleet of the specified size, distributing them among centroids proportional to productions. The output is in the project fleet file.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        total - the fleet size
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed

      • createFleetEq

        public void createFleetEq(SAVProject project,
                          int total)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This creates a fleet of the specified size, distributing them among centroids proportional to productions. The output is in the project fleet file.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        total - the fleet size
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed

      • readFleet

        public void readFleet(SAVProject project,
                      SAVSimulator sim)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Read the fleet from the fleet file.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        sim - the SAVSimulator (its construction is in progress)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed

      • setTripsToTravelers

        public void setTripsToTravelers(SAVProject project)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This goes through the static_od, dynamic_od, and demand files, and changes the type to TRAVELER. Then, this calls ReadDemandNetwork.prepareDemand(avdta.project.DemandProject, double) on the modified trip table.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed
